title: Spain : number of hotels and similar accommodation by number of rooms 2015
summary: In general Number of hotels has rose over the Year.
Number of hotels is slightly increasing from From_100_to_249_rooms to Less_than_25_rooms.
The line significantly increased by 3353.0 from Year From_100_to_249_rooms to From_25_to_99_rooms, and lastly, increased by 7059.0 from Year From_25_to_99_rooms to Less_than_25_rooms.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year From_25_to_99_rooms and Less_than_25_rooms.
The highest Number of hotels, of value 12170.0 was reached at Year Less_than_25_rooms
Minimum Number of hotels about 1758.0 was reached at Year From_100_to_249_rooms
min_summary: Overall Number of hotels has increased over the Year.
Number of hotels is slightly increasing from From_100_to_249_rooms to Less_than_25_rooms.
mid_summary: Overall Number of hotels has increased over the Year.

max_summary: In general Number of hotels has rose over the Year.
Number of hotels is slightly increasing from From_100_to_249_rooms to Less_than_25_rooms.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year From_25_to_99_rooms and Less_than_25_rooms.
The highest Number of hotels, of value 12170.0 was reached at Year Less_than_25_rooms
Minimum Number of hotels about 1758.0 was reached at Year From_100_to_249_rooms
The line drastically increased by 2.9 times from Year From_100_to_249_rooms to From_25_to_99_rooms, and lastly, increased by 2.4 times from Year From_25_to_99_rooms to Less_than_25_rooms.
